ships.name: Quark's Treasure
ships.text:
You do not pay a faction penalty when assigning any [crew] or [tech] Upgrades to this ship.
You do not place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship when using the Docking or Launching Actions.

captains.name: Quark
captains.text: ACTION: Discard all of your Upgrades to target a ship at Range 1-2. Target ship cannot attack your ship this round. You must discard at least 1 Upgrade to use this Action. You cannot attack or perform any free Actions this round.

captains.name: Zek
captains.text:
ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable 1 of your Upgrades and 1 Upgrade (your choice) on the target ship.

This card may only be purchased for a Ferengi ship.

captains.name: Brunt
captains.text:
ACTION: When defending this round, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may force 1 opposing ship to re-roll 1 of its attack dice (your choice).

You may field the Grand Nagus [talent] Upgrade. If you use the Action listed on it, you must discard this card as well.

admirals.name: Zek
admirals.text:
FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable 1 of your Upgrades and 1 Upgrade (your choice) on the target ship.


This card may only be purchased for a Ferengi ship.

upgrades.name: Grand Nagus
upgrades.text: ACTION: Discard this card to target every friendly Ferengi ship within Range 1-3. Each target ship may immediately perform an additional green maneuver.

upgrades.name: Smugglers
upgrades.text: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-3. Discard this card to steal 1 [tech] or [weapon] Upgrade from the target ship, even if it exceeds your ship's restrictions. If the Smugglers Upgrade is assigned to a Ferengi Shuttle, the stolen Upgrade is flipped face down and cannot be used by your ship. The shuttle may exchange the stolen Upgrade with a docking ship. The docking ship may then flip the stolen Upgrade face up and use it. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Ferengi Captain assigned to a Ferengi ship.

upgrades.name: Odo
upgrades.text: During the Planning Phase, you may target a ship within Range 1-3 and choose 1 [crew] Upgrade on the target ship. If you do so, treat this card as an exact copy of the chosen Upgrade until the end of the End Phase in which you use this ability. If the chosen Upgrade's Action or ability requires it to be disabled or discarded, you must disable or discard this card to use it.

upgrades.name: Nog
upgrades.text: When defending, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may discard this card to force the attacking ship to roll -2 attack dice for that attack.

upgrades.name: Rom
upgrades.text: ACTION: Repair 1 Shield Token. If this card is assigned to a Ferengi ship, you may repair up to 2 Shield Tokens instead of 1.

upgrades.name: Cargo Hold
upgrades.text:
Add 2 Upgrade slots ([crew] or [tech]) to your Upgrade Bar. These Upgrades cannot have a cost greater than 4 SP.

This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Ferengi ship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 Cargo Hold Upgrade.

upgrades.name: Inversion Wave
upgrades.text:
Instead of making a normal move, you may discard this card to place your ship anywhere in the play area within Range 1-3 of your current position. Remove all Tokens (except Critical Hit Tokens) from beside your ship and place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. You cannot attack on the round you use this ability.
No ship may be equipped with more than 1 Inversion Wave Upgrade.
